name: Cozy & Colorful by Nature (Private Room)
description:
Up in the hill of MontjuÃ¯c (a mountain overlooking the city where Jewish people were forced to retire when they were thrown out of town), only 10 minutes by bus from Girona's beautiful Old Town.

Private oom with private bathroom and garden just for you! You also have a wood house in the garden where to store your bike and other sports equipment.

The space
YOU'LL HAVE ONE PRIVATE ROOM WITH A PRIVATE BATHROOM AND GARDEN JUST FOR YOUR USE - IT'S A SHARED APARTMENT, MEANING YOU'RE NOT RENTING THE FULL PROPERTY. WE LIVE HERE, TOO ;)

Cozy, Sunny & colorful apartment with a refreshing garden facing east where to chill out in the hot summer nights.

You will have a private room with a direct and exclusive access to the garden. It has a new very comfy bed (135cm) and you will have your own bathroom.

There is a closet in the room.

The apartment is in a lovely suburb area 2' walk to the entrance of a Natural Park with g
neighborhood_overview: MontjuÃ¯c is most likely the best neighborhood in Girona. We are up in a hill, only 15-20 minutes to the center of the city, and surrounded by Nature. it is very safe and quiet.
host_about:
It's hard to define oneself in such a narrow space. I think we people are really complex material. But since I guess it's good I say a bit, I would define myself as someone fascinated about living and getting to know both this planet and its inhabitants. I'm interested in serving people, especially, but not exclusively, my friends. I enjoy good food and if possible better company. My interests are broad and go from traveling, literature, creative writing, philosophy and body "care" to Buddhism.  I'm pushful, curious, a bit narcissist maybe, hahaha, and I guess I tend to dream pies in the sky far too often.

I am original Catalan, from lovely Girona - Costa Brava but I've lived abroad for many long periods: Miami, Dubai, Bali and Melbourne (Australia). My live partner is a lovely aussie-greek Personal Trainer named Stelios and, together we travel the world, when not working.

I like outdoors sports and I am addicted to mountain biking. I also like snowboarding, climbing, hiking, swimming ...; I also do some mat work like yoga and Pilates (of which I am a certified Instructor). 

I read a lot, books facinate me!!

I like to go out eating with my friends from time to time, although I am most of a day-creature and at night I like my sleep. I practice ioga and meditation and have a second level on Reiki. I'm a flexitarian (meaning I eat fish but not meat) by moral reasons and I enjoy a lot good food, if possible made with organic products. Music, all kind of music - depending on the moment - is very important to me; couldn't live without it. But my main and huge passion is travelling and meeting new people, travellers like me, or locals, and learn about them and their experiences in life. 

After many yearts working for others, I am now running my my own company. It's a fresh project dedicated to giving marketing and creativity services & solutions to other companies. I am also a teacher at the University of Girona, where I teach at the Faculties of Tourism and Economics and I run an international women's project named "Grace of No Age", devoted to mature women.

I am pretty busy however I don't complain, as I do what I like.

name: Most beautiful holiday with or without guide.
description:
Hiking, biking or enjoy culture on the Costa Brava with host family.
Everything you need for an unforgettable holiday: varied walks or bike rides, detailed city walks, with or without guidance.

The space
My wife and I regularly go to our apartment in Ampuriabrava, known as the Venice of Spain on the Costa Brava. As avid hiking, cycling and culture lovers we have collected an enormous amount of information on the Costa Brava: detailed town walks, informative guides about museums and especially some 130 walks and a number of cycling trips. We have discovered over the years that the Costa Brava has much more to offer than beach and sun. That's why we started the formula host family to explore this unprecedented Spain at an affordable price.

Guest access
Common areas are the bathroom with toilet and living room.
In the bedroom are washing facilities (a sink) present.

Other things to note
For an additional compen
neighborhood_overview: Our residence is situated within walking distance of the beach, in the city center within walking distance of the shops but still pleasantly quiet as it is a private residence. In the neighbourhood there is a nature reserve and an airport for parachutists. The village includes 42 km. navigable canals.

name: Can Portell by 123ole: the Pink Box 2 pers
description:
The space
Bed & Breakfast 123ole, Can Portellâ has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hourâs drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyoneâs needs.
The house is an old masia farm and dates from 1690. The main building is surrounded by a beautiful plot of land with a swimming pool, stables, trees that provide shade and an original, abandoned corral where we now keep our horses. The house comes complete with a truly unique dÃ©cor, intriguing corridors, steps, rooms aplenty and a charming veranda â the perfect spot for a morning coffee, for reading the papers and for surveying the garden. This is where you will be served breakfast, and the occasional dinner if you so desire. The shady area underneath the veranda, furnished with loungers, offers cool relaxation.
Each season here has its own charm and beauty, so our doors are open to guests all year round.
host_about:
Ik kom oorspronkelijk uit Amsterdam, Nederland. sinds 2005 wonen wij in Catalunya, Spanje. En hebben daar onze trots, de Bed & Breakfast 123ole / Can Portell. Om te zien waarom wij hier zo gelukkig zijn zou je het moeten zien, ons paradijs. Wie weet tot snel in Spanje

name: CAMA EN UNA CASA DE LA COSTA BRAVA
description:
The space
If you want the Costa Brava, we offer two rooms in our house.
We are in a village in the middle of costa.En one of the most beautiful Catalan coast, with a privileged environment for mountain bike excursions, trekking, kayaking, diving, etc. ..
Two cozy private bedrooms in our house.
The rooms are equipped with heating and fans.
The bed linen is provided and towels.
The bathroom is for guests, with two services and a shower.
The price is 50 â¬ for each room, depending on the season.
Breakfast is optional 10 â¬ per room.
The house is in the center of town one of the most picturesque of Catalonia (Begur).
The house is in the oldest part of town but also in a quiet area just 50 meters from the square and the entertainment area as well as the bus stop that takes you to the best beaches of the Costa Brava.
And with direct bus to the city of Barcelona, Girona and the city railway station.

name: Bedroom 2 adults/1 child Communal Pool. Beach 17km
description:
Bedroom, 17 m2, with a double bed and a single bed. Bath/WC. Situated in the first floor of the Big Cottage. Breakfast possible.

The space
Can Gat Vell are two farmhouses completely restored and adapted in 6 apartments. Capacity from 2 until 35 people. Gat Vell is the best place to organize meetings with family, friends and also for business.
The property is the departure to excursions, culture walkings and for gastronomy roads in the whole region.
Can Gat Vell is very well communicated, at only 2 km from motorway AP7. Best beaches of the Costa Brava at 17 km. At less than 30 km, we have Girona, Figueres. The volcans region of La Garrotxa is at only 46 km. Border with France at 35 mn.
Properties have areas to be shared in order to enjoy the family and the peacefulness. Swimming pool, garden, barbecue, covered terrace. Inside space for children. Ping pong. Football, basquet. Wi-fi. Parking in the grounds.

Guest access
- Activi
neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT OUR VILLAGE : LLAMPAIES

The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands.

The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP

Me encanta estar en contacto con las personas, ayudarles en lo mÃ¡ximo que pueda y prestarles todos los servicios para que estÃ©n satisfechos. DespuÃ©s de 23 aÃ±os de vivir en la ciudad de Barcelona, vivir aquÃ­ en una casa rodeada de casas medievales y campos es un cambio radical necesario para volver a disfrutar de la vida y la verdad muy bonito.

name: Double room near train/bus station
description:
The space
Hi there!

We are Pilar and her son, Arnau. Pilar lives in the apartment and Arnau is currently based in Barcelona. Due to Pilar's difficulties with English, Arnau is helping out with all the reservations, but you might meet him as well, specially on weekends.

We are happy to offer the possibility of hosting you in our beautiful apartment in the centre of Girona, only five minutes far from the train/bus station (that connects you with Barcelona, Madrid and Figueres among other; and where you can catch a bus to Girona airport).
At the same time, you can reach the old city and the well-known ancient Jewish quarter within 10 minutes walking. Do not miss it's charming and enigmatic atmosphere!

name: Rural Hostel Mas Cadavall
description:
At Mas Cadavall we invite you to enjoy the simplest acts, to experience a slower pace that allows you to perceive the subtlety of the nuances of the changing nature that surrounds us and of the nature of oneself. We wish you a happy stay and coexistence!

The space
Mas Cadavall is a large, beautiful and simple white farmhouse surrounded by forest. It is located in a privileged place. Isolated and surrounded by nature and at the same time close to various locations. 15 minutes from Banyoles and BesalÃº. at 30min. from Girona, Olot and Figueres. And 45 minutes from the nearest beach (Sant MartÃ­ d'EmpÃºries).

The accommodation belongs to the farmhouse, in which the hosts live and with whom the exterior of the house is shared.

The accommodation has a room with two bunk beds, an outside toilet, kitchen and porch / living room separated from each other. On the porch there is a sofa, table and an artisan wood oven.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
The hostel is located in a privileged natural environment! Close there are 2 rivers: the Fluvia (15 min. Walking), ideal for strolling along the beautiful path that borders the river and the Ser (20 min.), perfect for swinming and enjoying the journey.
For those of you who miss civilization, don't worry. 15min by car is Banyoles (a large town with supers, shops ... and the best ... a beautifu place for swinming and enjoy the walks it offers) and 30min. there is Girona, Figueres and Olot.
BesalÃº is at the gates of La Garrotxa, the beautiful medieval town just 15 minutes away. And nearby is also the volcanic area of ââLa Garrotxa.
And the sea? Well, the closest beach is in Sant MartÃ­ d'Empuries at 45min.

NIÃOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÃDEO

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compaÃ±Ã­a siempre que quieras. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demÃ¡s.

name: Just us 2, in a cozy apartment in the mountains!
description:
in English...

Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Green Apartment...
Â· Is a 20 m2 room with no balcony. There is a common outside space one floor below.
Â· Suitable for a couple and eventually a baby or a small child.
Â· Double bed (160cm) and private bath room.
Â· Kitchenette suitable for breakfasts and/or a simple meal preparation. With fridge, microwave and kitchen utensils.
Â· Central heating and tv&wifi. All the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
Â· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peacful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orqu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called âAlta Garrotxaâ. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bikeâs to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

Probablemente esta mezcla multifacÃ©tica , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo mÃ¡s agradable y memorable como sea posible. NIÃOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÃDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y MatÃ­as, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el autÃ©ntico espÃ­ritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberÃ­an tener contrato indefinido y pensiÃ³n vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huÃ©spedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baÃ±os completos, el salÃ³n de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardÃ­n con mobiliario y juegos para niÃ±os. Pero tambiÃ©n acompaÃ±an a los huÃ©spedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niÃ±os con su buen carÃ¡cter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas reciÃ©n llegadas con paciencia, cariÃ±o y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cÃ³mo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan reciÃ©n hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del paÃ­s en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compaÃ±Ã­a siempre que quieras. TambiÃ©n es un lugar ideal para niÃ±os, ya que rÃ¡pidamente se enamorarÃ¡n de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y tambiÃ©n es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos dÃ­as en la naturaleza y que los dos hagÃ¡is buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demÃ¡s.

name: Close to sea and main street  #1
description:
Lovely double room with double bed, TV, large closet and window to patio. Apartment situated between the port of Palamos and the main street of the village, 5 minutes walk from the beach, the fish market and the lighthouse.

The space
Among one of the most charming ports of Costa Brava and the most pristine beaches in the area. About four streets is the lighthouse of the town, from which you can see the race boats at 6:45 a.m. in the morning: a beautiful sight of the open sea can enjoy a few minutes before sunrise.
The best way to see the beaches and coves of the area is the coastal path linking Palamos with other locations: an idyllic walk hard to forget.

Guest access
On the floor you have the option of tasting the most typical dishes of the area at a great price, prepared by an excellent chef specializing in Mediterranean cuisine.

neighborhood_overview: The small community of Llampaies is situated towards the east of the region, not far from Camallera (2 km), where all kinds of amenities are available. The surrounding countryside boasts gentle rolling hills, farmland and coniferous woodlands. The tiny center of Llampaies is formed of typical local houses. The quarter around the church is the oldest part of the village. Around 100 meters to the north, is the smaller Vecindario del Puig, a group of houses, built in the 17th and 18th centuries. 200 meters from Vecindario del Puig is the Vecindario de los Masos. Some of the houses here date from the end of the 18th century, although the majority were built in the 19th century. There are around 100 people living in the center.
host_name: Turisme Rural Can Gat Vell SCP
host_about:
Hola a tod@s,
Fue en Mayo del 2013 que decidimos venir a vivir aquÃ­ en la provincia de Girona ... y hacer un cambio radical de vida. NecesitÃ¡bamos alejarnos de la ciudad, de la falta de respeto, de una convivencia que se hacÃ­a cada vez mÃ¡s insoportable, del egoÃ­smo y anonimato que conocÃ­amos en Barcelona. Ahora disfrutamos de estos pequeÃ±os detalles de cada dÃ­a, en Llampaies, un nÃºcleo de muy pocos habitantes: el cielo, sus amaneceres y puestas de sol, el ambiente rural al 100%. la naturaleza con nuestros insectos, plantas y Ã¡rboles, nuestros animales con las gallinas y conejos, nuestro gato Llamp y sobre todo disfrutar cada momento con nuestros hijos, Roger y Oriol.
Estamos muy felices de poderos recibir en nuestra casa y haceros descubrir nuestra comarca tan bonita. 
Hasta pronto.
Eduard, Isabelle, Roger y Oriol

neighborhood_overview:
Located 1 km from the center of Begur, just 3 km from the beautiful coves of Sa tuna, Fornells, Aiguablava, Sa Riera, etc.

Located in the heart of EmpordÃ , the town of Begur and its beaches is one of the most wonderful spots on the Costa Brava. The town boundary takes in the impressive hills of the Begur Massif and an extensive coastline washed by the Mediterranean sea.

The striking silhouette of the medieval castle overlooking the old town, its numerous monuments and colonial-style houses (the village has cultural ties to Cuba) and the narrow streets and alleys give the village a beauty that is easy to enjoy. The old fishermen's huts still conserved in the Begur coves, also testify to a long and intense history that make Begur and its natural surroundings an unbeatable place to visit.

name: "Garden-view" double/twin 2.
description:
Well illuminated double bedroom overlooking the garden and fish pond.
Has windows on two sides therefore received the sun for most of the day.
This room is not "en suite". It has its own private bathroom adjacent to the bedroom.
Casa Dos Torres is on the road to the beach which is a 5 minute walk away.
A full description is available is available on the casadostorres website.

The space
Casa Dos Torres is a registered "pension" in Calella de Palafrugell.
We described ourselves as a Bed and Breakfast but this category does not exist here in Sapin therefore we have been given the registration "P" by the Generalitat de Catalunya.

Guest access
Guests are permitted to use our kitchen facilities. This year with the pandemia the kitchen facilities will not be available.
There is free WiFi.
We have a pretty garden with numerous seating areas plus a swimming pool (in season).

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Calella de Palafrugell is an old fishing village. It's centre has retained the original "look" of the place but it has grown considerably over the years.
It still does retain a charm and beauty which attracts people from all over the world.
Calella de Palafrugell is a well known seaside "village in The Costa Brava much frequented by the local Catalans.
The first Saturday in July each year there is the Havanares Festival.
Throughout July and August the Cap Roig gardens hold regular concerts.
This year there may not be concerts!

neighborhood_overview:
The house is on the outskirts of a charming medieval village at the foot of which the Orlina river flows.
The village is very peaceful, it has a small grocery store open in the morning only.
You can take beautiful walks, discover dolmens and menhirs in the middle of the surrounding garrigue, located in the Albera natural park.
host_about:
D'origine QuÃ©becoise, je m'occupe de cette merveilleuse maison de famille qui a au dessus de 400 ans ,et dans laquelle on fabriquait autrefois l'huile d'olive, le pain et le vin.
 Je partage cette occupation avec ma mÃ¨re qui elle,est catalane d'origine et vit au QuÃ©bec une grande partie de l'annÃ©e.
J'ai suivi une formation en tourisme et aime partager ma passion pour la vie.
  Ma mÃ¨re ,elle ,est massothÃ©rapeuthe et enseigne le Qi Gong, elle donne des ateliers d'initiation de cet art.
  Nous aimons toutes les deux recevoir les gens, qu'ils se sentent Ã  l'aise et chaleureusement accueillis.
  Nous aimons aussi la nature, les plantes, la musique, la mer, la montagne, avoir du plaisir et partager tous ces merveilleux cadeaux que nous donne la vie;

name: Casa Tranquila - Pau - Girona Private Rooms
description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

License number
HUTB-016343
host_about:
As a former London photographers agent and an internationally travelled professional photographer we both have a love for the arts. We are ideally placed for culture lovers (The Dali museum close by in Figueres and Salvador DalÃ­âs house in Portlligat), walkers (step out of the gate and youâre straight onto the path into the Alberes mountains, and if you feel energetic up to the Creu Blanca and monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes), or photographers looking to capture the delights of this region, and then make use of our fully operational professional dark-room, accessed from the terrace. 

Our delightful 3 storey village house is in the centre of this peaceful Catlan village, within walking distance of the village outdoor pool, the Civic Centre with bar, food, jazz nights etc, the village shop, tennis courts, paddle courts, 2 bars and 3 further restaurants. 

The house itself is well hidden between high walls but just inside the gate is a delightful terrace, ideal for outdoor dining. The house itself is beautifully maintained with a lovely multi-level, open plan lounge/dining/kitchen area. On this level too is a bedroom and bathroom, satellite TV, English SKY. Stairs lead to the second floor with 2 further bedrooms and a bathroom, and a final set of stairs lead to the master bedroom with en suite. From here there are stunning views of the whole village and to the sea.

name: Double ensuite sea view - mi casa, tu casa
description:
I love it here - but I am biased!!
Our holiday home is situated between the traditional fishing town of St Feliu de Guixols and the popular tourist resort of Platja D'Aro.
'S'Agaro', boasts one of the regions most spectacular stretches of Costa Brava coast and is perfect for a holiday of variety - or for a simple break with sun, sea and sand every day!

The space
The house has a fantastic location with the beautiful Sant Pol beach less than a 10 minute walk away. There you can hire kayaks, SUPs, windsurfers and dinghies. We have 'from the front door' access to cycle routes, run routes and hiking ... and its an easy walk or very short (<5mins) drive to the awesome via ferrate Cala de Moli. If it's activity you want your choices are endless. If music and culture are more your thing, we are nestled between the pleasant, traditional port town of St Feliu de Guixols (home of Spains oldest summer music festival "Festival de la Porta Ferrada' featuring a
neighborhood_overview:
It's a very quiet neighbourhood, but for those who want it, the noise and hustle and bustle of Platja D'Aro and St Feliu are just 5 minutes away!

I really enjoy walking the 'Cami de Ronda' coastal walk and cycling the 'Via Verde' Railroad to Girona.

There's loads to do and I'm very happy to share local knowledge with you!
host_about:
I've shared my home for many years and love meeting new people and learning more about the world through them!

As a host I am pretty flexible and relaxed - mi casa su casa!  Ultimately I want you to feel this is a comfortable home from home - if you are visiting the region on business I know what it is like to want your own space to relax in after a long day so I'll respect  your privacy, and if you are here for outdoor activities or tourism and want some ideas and tips of places to go,  I am happy to share my thoughts.

I can't live without great mates, trips to the countryside, occasional long walks (up Scottish munro's or across Spain on the Camino de Santiago) - and 'supper club' with friends!

No life motto - except perhaps to be useful every day!

It is a house located almost in the center of Sant Feliu:
5 minutes walk from the center with shops and restaurants, sports pavilion and municipal swimming pool.
10 minutes walk from the beach.
Free public parking within 2 minutes walk.

Ideal to enjoy a few days near the beach and in peace.

The space
It is a double room, very spacious, bright, with a terrace and it is on the first floor, therefore, you have to climb stairs to access it.
The bathroom is shared and is on the ground floor.
Semi-reformed old house, high ceilings, hydraulic floors.
The room faces the street, there is little traffic but a car may pass at night.

If you have mobility problems, I do not recommend coming, the stairs are old and could be difficult to go upstai
neighborhood_overview:
It is a fairly central neighborhood as you have everything you need within a 10 minute walk.
The street is quite busy during the day and can cause a bit annoying noise to people in the room.
If you are looking for a very quiet room, I have another with a private bathroom and facing the inner courtyard of the house.

In Girona there are a wide range of interesting things to do:- touristic, cultural, gastronomical etcâ¦

The space

neighborhood_overview:
The residential neighbourhood where we live is called Palau.
The main advantage of living in Palau is that it feels like a village but with all the virtues of the city. This relaxing atmosphere is impossible to find in the city centre and without the nightmare and cost of having to find parking space!
We are located between where the city ends and the countryside begins, so that means you are free to enjoy both options at your own chosen rhythm.

name: Casa Moira - The White Room
description:
Our home is a typical village house in the centre of Garriguella, having been sympathetically modernised over the years. We offer bed & breakfast and have 2 lovely bedrooms to rent each having a dedicated bathroom. The Blue Room ( also listed ) can be booked together with The White Room . Our house is surrounded by a beautiful walled garden, featuring a number of trees to provide both sunny and shady areas. The swimming pool is available to all our visitors. New for 2019 - Summer Kitchen.

The space
The white room is tastefully decorated bright and modern, small double bedroom with it's own wash basin, toilet next door and, in high season, it's a short walk to the shower room.

Guest access
Guests are free you to use the balconies, garden, pool, summer kitchen and living room

Other things to note
There is a fan in each room and wifi throughout.
We have two friendly cats who live in the house.
Our price in
neighborhood_overview:
Garriguella is a rural Alt Emporda village nestling in the foothills of the Alberes. It has shops, bars and restaurants ranging from the gastronomic to simple Catalan cooking. The notable tortoise sanctuary is here, plus the renowned Garriguella Cooperativa where the local wine is sold along with other artisan products and customers eat and drink the local fare on it's shaded restaurant terrace.
From Garriguella, the beaches of Llanca and Roses are an easy 15 minutes drive. We are very close, by car to the Pyrenees, Cadaques and all things 'Salvador Dali' around his home of Figueres. Our's is a peaceful and relaxing place, but there's plenty to do if you can't sit still. Everything from horse riding, cycling, donkey treks, hiking, kayaking, skydiving and much more are all available in the close proximity of our home.
host_about: Moira is from Scotland and Adam is originally from Essex. They married in Scotland and are now living in rural Catalunya. Moira is a jewellery designer with her own collection 9seven2 jewellery and also designs for a number of UK high street retailers. Adam, a RHS trained gardener , works locally tending both large and small gardens. Their house is shared with two friendly cats. Since their move from London, Adam and Moira's lif has followed a gentler tempo; walking, lots of fresh air, beautiful views and of course, the local wine.

I can share on summer season 1 bedroom with private bathroom, living room with Cable TV and Netflix and terrace with excellence mountain views and sky.

Also, parking for 1 car available and private gym (iniside the apartament) and community pool and relax area.

I work in a area hotel. I wake up at 07.00 am, I return at 20.00 pm.

The space

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The residential neighbourhood where we live is called Palau.
The main advantage of living in Palau is that it feels like a village but with all the virtues of the city. This relaxing atmosphere is impossible to find in the city centre and without the nightmare and cost of having to find parking space!
We are located between where the city ends and the countryside begins, so that means you are free to enjoy both options at your own chosen rhythm.

name: Sleep & Stay- Luxury top floor apt with terrace
description:
Luxury apartment with terrace with amazing views over the old town, Cathedral and river Onyar. This spacious apartment of 160m2, has been remodelled in 2007 and will make you feel at home instantly in Girona. With the top location on the main shopping street of Santa Clara and having the best restaurants around the corner.

The space
The apartment has downstairs an open kitchen with bar, dining table, fire place and lounge area. There is a separate lounge area, which can be used as bike storage, ping pong area and is big enough for a group of 6 for a yoga class.
Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms. The main bedroom has a beautiful terrace, with dining table for 4. It's on the rive side, with the most incredible views over the Cathedral. The spot to enjoy your morning coffee or warm summer nights.
JULY - AUGUST - SEPTEMBER 2022: they're repainting the back facade, the side of the river/living room/main bedroom. Therefor we provide a discounte
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the river front of the Santa Clara street. Its impossible that you miss out on landmarks , shops, and the rich culture of Girona.
host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

name: Masia rural a BegudÃ .Zona volcÃ nica de la Garrotxa
description:
Country house built in 1897 but completely renovated and equipped, preserving the original structure and form.

The farm is located within the Garrotxa Volcanic Zone Natural Park, famous for its natural wealth and landscapes.

In the farm are living all kinds of animals like cows, horses, goats, sheep, dogs and cats.

My home makes a perfect option for those who are seeking tranquility and nature in an unrepeatable place.

The space
Room 1: double bed, sofa, fireplace, tv and heating.

Room 2: multipurpose room with a pim-pom table, but in case 4 guests, a mattress can be placed with an extra double bed.

Barbecue-kitchen: dishwasher, fridge, table, ceramic hob, microwave, barbecue and all necessary to cook.

WC: private bathroom with shower.

In addition, you can also have the pool 24 hours a day, table football, and interact with all the animals that you will find throughout the farm.

name: Casa Moira - The Blue Room
description:
Our home is a typical village house in the centre of Garriguella, having been sympathetically modernised over the years. We offer bed & breakfast and have two lovely bedrooms to rent each having a dedicated bathroom. The White Room ( also listed ) can be booked together with The Blue Room. Our house is surrounded by a beautifully planted walled garden, featuring large trees to provide both sunny and shady areas. The swimming pool is available to all our visitors. New for 2019 Summer Kitchen.

The space
The Blue Room is a large and modern family room with 2 single beds and space for a cot if required.

Guest access
the garden, the pool, the summer kitchen, the shared living room and terraces are available to our guests

Other things to note
There's a fan in each room and wifi throughout.
We have two friendly cats who live in the house.
Our price includes a tourist tax at a rate of â¬0.90 per person ( over 16)
neighborhood_overview:
Garriguella is a rural Alt Emporda village, set in the foothills of the Alberes. It has shops, bars, and restaurants ranging from the gastronomic to simple Catalan cooking. The notable Tortoise Sanctuary is here, plus the renowned Garriguella Cooperativa where local wine is sold along with other artisan products and customers can eat and drink the local fare on it's shaded restaurant terrace.
From Garriguella, the beaches of Llanca and Roses are only an easy 15 minute drive. We are very close by car to the Pyrenees, Cadaques and all thing 'Salvador Dali' around his home of Figueres. Our's is a peaceful and relaxing place, but there's plenty to do if you can't sit still. Everything from horse riding, cycling, donkey treks, hiking, kayaking, skydiving and much more are all available in the close proximity of our home.
host_about: Moira is from Scotland and Adam is originally from Essex. They married in Scotland and are now living in rural Catalunya. Moira is a jewellery designer with her own collection 9seven2 jewellery and also designs for a number of UK high street retailers. Adam, a RHS trained gardener , works locally tending both large and small gardens. Their house is shared with two friendly cats. Since their move from London, Adam and Moira's lif has followed a gentler tempo; walking, lots of fresh air, beautiful views and of course, the local wine.

host_about:
Sporty, easy-going, social, relaxed and with a big smile. 
I have hosted and beeing hosted in couchsurfing for a cople of years, so I know how to be a good host or guest:)  (search for lbi in Oslo if you go to www couchsurfing com, the you will see my profile and how people describe me) 
I am a teacher (sports, geography and maths) and lately I switched to work with exams and private students. This gives longer periods with freetime, so 
in 2017 I got a flat in Blanes, the coast 60km north of Barcelona, where I partly live and just now started beeing a airbnb-host. Hope to meet a lot of great travellers to share travellingstories and local knowlegde in this spectacular coastline around Blanes. Hablo espanol, falo portugues, ich spreche ein bisschen deutch, parlo un'po italiano and because I'm norwegian I also understand the scandinavian language. Hope to learn French and Catalan soon:)

name: Bedroom "Girona" with swimming-pool
description:
Bunk beds room in a house shared with other guests.
In a privileged place, with swimming pool, next to an ancient church. 5 minutes from BesalÃº medieval village and 35 minutes from the beach.
The room door is old and does not lock from the inside or outside.
Ancient and authentic house, where you can breathe the atmosphere of a noble house of the XVIII century.

The space
Take a swim in the pool, contemplating the Romanesque church of the XII century, in the same garden. Spectacular views of the snowy Pyrenees in winter.

Let your senses feel nature, peace, tranquility,...

It is located in a small village, Dosquers. Well located, half an hour from the beaches of the Costa Brava, 5 minutes from the beautiful medieval village.

Huge house of traditional Catalan construction, built between the XV and XVIII centuries. It has a small cellar cellar where the wine was made.

neighborhood_overview:
EncÃ­s d'EmpordÃ  is located in a privileged location between the sea and the mountains. It is located next to the best beaches on the Costa Brava on one side, with the coastal-paths bordering the coast, or the Marine Reserve of the Islands Medas in the MontgrÃ­ Natural Park, ideal for scuba diving. On the other side we find the MontgrÃ­ mountain massif, the cork forests of Les Gavarres, the Natural park of the Aiguamolls de l'EmpordÃ  or the Vies Verdes, old railway paths rehabilitated as roads, ideal for cycling and hiking.
In addition, EncÃ­s d'EmpordÃ  is surrounded by a network of charming medieval villages with an exceptional legacy of Romanesque art, such as Pals or Peratallada (10km from the hotel), CruÃ¯lles and Monells (4km), CorÃ§Ã  and Ullastret (2km). Nearby is the so-called Dalinian Trianglethat follows the footsteps left by the empordÃ  artist in Figueres-Portlligat-PÃºbol. A step away is also located the historical old town of Girona. description:
As a Bed and Breakfast we offer individually rented rooms, each having their own private bathroom, and use of communal areas and heated pool. A unique position on the Costa Brava and about 20 minutes away from beaches, bays, villages and restaurants. Ideally suited for nature lovers, there is a network of well over 1000 km of walks and cycling trails. Sant Grau is a true paradise in the mountains with beautiful views, peace and quiet.

The space
La Roqueta, situated in a nature reserve, lies at an altitude of approximately 480 meters in the mountains between Sant Feliu and Tossa de Mar.
All rooms have sea views, there is a large garden with terraces and seating areas and a swimming pool where you can refresh yourself after sunbathing on the deckchairs and sun loungers.
The distance from the nearest beaches and villages of Tossa, Sant Feliu and Platja d'Aro is approximately 15km.

name: Home from Home.
description:
Casa Dos Torres is a registered "Pension" in Calella de Palafrugell.
Well illuminated double bedroom overlooking the garden area. It has south facing windows and is therefore bright and sunny for most of the day.
Casa Dos Torres is on the road to the beach which is a 5 minute walk away.
There is free on street parking outside the house.
A full description is available is available on the casadostorres website.

The space
We described ourselves as a Bed and Breakfast but this category does not exist here in Spain therefore we have been given the registration "P" by the Generalitat de Catalunya.

Guest access
Guests are not permitted to use our kitchen facilities but can prepare simple meals, snacks etc.
There is free WiFi.
We have a pretty garden with numerous seating areas plus a swimming pool (in season).

Other things to note
There are numerous walking trails in the area the most used on

Calella de Palafrugell is a well known seaside "village in The Costa Brava much frequented by the local Catalans.
The first Saturday in July each year there is the Havanares Festival.
Throughout July and August the Cap Roig gardens hold regular concerts.

name: Romantic Tower Suite
description:
This is our Romantic Tower Suite. It is situated on the second floor at the rear of the house overlooking the garden and fish pond. It has windows on both the south and east and is therefore has a sunny disposition.
It is a bright tower double at the top of the West Tower with a large bathroom below all enclosed in it's own space.
Being at the rear of the house it is quieter.

The space
The garden has numerous seating areas both in the sun or in the shade. There is a large swimming pool and adjacent decked area.

Guest access
Except for our own private zone there are not any space that is "out of bounds".

Other things to note
We have free on street parking at the house. It is a 5 minute walk to the beach/restaurants/bars etc.

name: Light & Airy Master Bedroom in Family Home
description:
Charming private master bedroom. King size bed with quality pocket sprung mattress. Vaulted ceiling, tiled floor, stylish decor and artwork. A tranquil room in which to relax after enjoying a day at the beach or further afield. Ideal for 1 or 2 people. Additional mattress on fold up bed for 3rd person on request (additional 25â¬).

The bedroom forms part of our home, an eclectic, spacious, colourful house located in a picturesque vibrant seaside town, a short walk to the fabulous local beach.

The space
The listing is for the master bedroom in our family home in the "old town" of L'Escala, a former fishing village, on the beautiful Costa Brava. The bedroom is situated in the middle floor of the house. The toilet and bathroom, which are shared by family members, are also found on the middle floor. The terrace, on the top floor, with a rustic table and chairs, is available to guests but all other parts of the house are used by family members only. Ther
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated in a peaceful residential area in the "old town" of L'Escala, close to several beaches. The sandy family beach, surrounded by a variety of cafes and restaurants, is located just beyond the bottom of our road. Creu Cove, a minute's walk away (to the left of our house), is great for snorkelling. The larger, sandy crescent beaches of Empuries are a short walk away, and if you want a bit of culture you can visit the nearby Greco-Roman ruins of Empuries. Also within walking distance (a bit of a hike, but worth the walk), along the beautiful scenic coastal path, is Sant Marti d'Empuries, a charming hill top hamlet with a selection of fabulous restaurants, overlooking the Golf of Roses.

If you drive, there is free parking in our street but the residents use the spaces so you will most likely have to park your car at the top of the road if there is space (paid for parking June to September) or there is a free car park on the way out of the village (next to

description:
Suite room with a refined style to enjoy a warm stay in a spacious space. From the Suites you can enjoy views of the garden, swimming pool or the Tossa d'Alp peak.

All our rooms maintain the rural atmosphere of the farm, the furniture is original and all the floors are parquet.

Capacity up to 2 people.

Room size: 24 m2 - 32 m2 (approx.)

The space
In the middle of nature and next to PuigcerdÃ , Mas Sant Marc is a charming rural house owned by three generations of a Catalan family.

Originally built in the 19th century and renovated with all the comforts over time, the house has retained its character. It is decorated with period furniture in a country style that blends with its stone walls and parquet floors.

With 12 rooms and a Villa, Mas Sant Marc is the ideal place to completely relax. You can enjoy horseback and pony rides from the same property, massages with a physiotherapist, bicycle rental or even play g

Room with a double bed and two singles with private bathroom inside Las Heras farmhouse. It can be reserved for double or quadruple use. The space
Ca n'Heras d'Adri is an ancient farmhouse, which has grown over the centuries, adapting to each time, each style and needs of the Heras family, owners of the farmhouse since its inception and until recently years. Here you will not find decorative whims or the comforts of other accommodations, but the smell of lit fireplaces in each room and the views it gives us give us a spirituality that no other place can offer you.

Hola soc la Jacqueline. Soc holandesa pero fa mes de 40 anys que vaig marxar de Holanda. Vaig viure en Madrid, Palma de Mallorca, CanÃ ries. Uns 10 anys en diferents estats de USA. DesprÃ©s me vaig afincar en Palafrugell, aixo ara ja fa uns 30 anys.
Sempre he treballat en el sector del turisme. 
Mâencanta conÃ¨ixer gent i fer-les sentir a gust i com a (Website hidden by Airbnb) que a mi mâagrada, cuan vaig a un lloc, que me informin i avisen cuan i que hi ha a fer a la zona, que es Interesant i imprescindible de veure, a on se menja be ... etc etc, jo faig lo mateix amb els hostess que estan al Sweet & Suite. 
Sense invadir la privacitat ni intimitat, estem sempre disponibles. 
Veniu a comprovar i segur que tornareu. Una abraÃ§ada, Jacqueline

A load of time, a load of stones, a load of hopes... And we are one of many families that have lived here. We made it ours; we restored it with the respect it deserves, accurately, using ecological and autochthonous materials from the zone, and retrieving almost forgotten ancient building methods.

Using public transport to go to beaches is the easyest and most economic way (1â¬ adulte, 0,50 â¬ enfant). Beach buses brings you frequently to Sa Tuna, Sa Riera y Aiguablava. Bus stop is 8 min. far from home.
host_about:
Hi
I'm French and lucky to live in Spain since 2003 with my family. I'm a communication advisor and graphic designer. My husband, Ernesto is half Spanish and half Mexican, he works as Comercial Director. We'are having 2 teenagers kids.
We bought this house recently and spent a lot of energy and time to renovate it with love.
Hope you'll will enjoy your journey.

Laure&Ernesto

It is one of the most central neighborhoods of the city, you can leave the driver and go to any place or act that interests you walking, despite being one of the quietest and quietest neighborhoods as it is not on the waterfront, but from Our terrace will allow you to see and at the same time visualize a spectacular panoramic view of the city.

description:
It has got a double bed with canopy, chest of drawers and night table, everything made of chestnut and done in the workplace of the country house. The floor is made of real oak tins.

The bathroom is blue, and the toilet is made of ancient porcelain. A tiny loophole is sometimes the lair of some birds.

The space
"Mas Cal Sastre" is a country house about which we find written references in the 14th century, as a dependent cabin of the Solterra Castle, in the municipality of Sant Hilari Sacalm, in the heart of the zone called âLes Guilleriesâ.

A load of time, a load of stones, a load of hopes... And we are one of many families that have lived here. We made it ours; we restored it with the respect it deserves, accurately, using ecological and autochthonous materials from the zone, and retrieving almost forgotten ancient building methods.

Built in 1792, this family-owned bed & breakfast is located on 10 hectares, and is just 3 km to the beach. The property has many varieties of fruit trees, an olive orchard, and a large swimming pool. A walking and bike path are next to the house. The masÃ­a is fully renovated with all the modern conveniences but maintains its rustic charm. The bedroom has its own bathroom, TV, wifi, and private entrance. Breakfast included and chef available for all meals!

The space
Swim in the pool, walk through the orchard and gardens, or enjoy the nearby beach.

Guest access
Guests have access to the pool, pool showers and bathroom, gardens, and outdoor kitchen (all the basics plus a BBQ).

Other things to note
Aside from detailed cleaning, we try to allow 24 hours after each guest so the room is safe for the next reservation. Your hosts are vaccinated!

description:

Para clubs deportivos ofrecemos paks con pension completa. Los huespedes pueden realizar actividades que ofrecemos. Si soys amantes de los deportes de 2 ruedas encontrareis tracks para la practica de Ciclismo y BTT Ademas disponemos de Circuito de motocross y motos de alquiler con toda la equipacion.

host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

neighborhood_overview:
Both in summer and in winter, we offer several outdoor activities, such as walks on the paths that surround us.
The municipality of Camprodon is one of the largest in the valley, thanks to the addition of the areas of Freixenet, ColÃ²nia Estebanell and the picturesque villages of Rocabruna and Beget.

In Camprodon, tourism has been present since the beginning of the 19th century, with the arrival of the first hikers and important people from the bourgeoisie of Barcelona. Valleys and mountains will allow you to enjoy its charm, whether walking, climbing, skiing, fishing or just enjoying your leisure time, without forgetting about our gastronomy that will not leave you indifferent.

We are very close to several places that are worth visiting: the Ripoll Monastery, the Sant Joan de les Abadesses Monastery, La Garrotxa area, Vall de NÃºria and several villages that are equally beautiful and picturesque. We are just a few km from France, which is also a recommended tr

neighborhood_overview:
Both in summer and in winter, we offer several outdoor activities, such as walks on the paths that surround us.
The municipality of Camprodon is one of the largest in the valley, thanks to the addition of the areas of Freixenet, ColÃ²nia Estebanell and the picturesque villages of Rocabruna and Beget.

In Camprodon, tourism has been present since the beginning of the 19th century, with the arrival of the first hikers and important people from the bourgeoisie of Barcelona. Valleys and mountains will allow you to enjoy its charm, whether walking, climbing, skiing, fishing or just enjoying your leisure time, without forgetting about our gastronomy that will not leave you indifferent.

We are very close to several places that are worth visiting: the Ripoll Monastery, the Sant Joan de les Abadesses Monastery, La Garrotxa area, Vall de NÃºria and several villages that are equally beautiful and picturesque. We are just a few km from France, which is also a recommend

name: Bonaire Hotel - Double room, L'Escala
description:
Located in the village of L'Escala, just 20 metres from the beach, the Hotel Bonaire is an establishment whose management was passed from parents to children until three years ago, which was transferred to other managers but now it is back to the Hotel Bonaire of before. A family hotel, managed by the same people who founded it. In its facilities it is possible to rest in an atmosphere where the family treatment and a great tranquility stand out.

The space
It is a centrally located hotel, which distributes its spaces in a classic and well-preserved construction, decorated with good taste and functionality. The hotel has an elevator and Wi-Fi.

The Hotel has 12 rooms decorated in a very cosy style. It has single, double, triple and quadruple alternatives, and all of them have a terrace, sea views and lateral views of the sea. name: Bonaire Hotel - quadruple room, L'Escala
description:
Located in the village of L'Escala, just 20 metres from the beach, the Hotel Bonaire is an establishment whose management was passed from parents to children until three years ago, which was transferred to other managers but now it is back to the Hotel Bonaire of before. A family hotel, managed by the same people who founded it. In its facilities it is possible to rest in an atmosphere where the family treatment and a great tranquility stand out.

The space
It is a centrally located hotel, which distributes its spaces in a classic and well-preserved construction, decorated with good taste and functionality. The hotel has an elevator and Wi-Fi.

The Hotel has 12 rooms decorated in a very cosy style. It has single, double, triple and quadruple alternatives, and all of them have a terrace, sea views and lateral views of the sea. name: Modernist Suite in the heart of the Costa Brava
description:
Large private Suite room in the heart of the Costa Brava. The room is on a modernist floor with generous spaces, balconies and terrace. Room with King Size double bed, wardrobe, chest of drawers, bedside tables, large table and chairs. Private bathroom with bathtub inside the room.
The apartment is my home and the common spaces are spacious to share and allow privacy. Beaches and mountains within short distances.
Check DISCOUNTS for stays longer than one month.

The space
The common areas are spacious, there is a dining room in the living room, another in the kitchen and another on the terrace. The kitchen is spacious and full equipped. The location is perfect to enjoy nature, 5 minutes from Las Gavarras, 15 minutes from the sea, 30 minutes from the city of Gerona. La Bisbal is the capital of the region with access to organic markets, supermarkets and shops of all kinds. Consult special discounts for stays longer than one month.

Guest acces
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the edge of the historic center of La Bisbal with access by foot to the entire monumental and commercial area. We have a beautiful walk, the proximity of the Gavarras and many medieval villages in the area a few minutes by car.

name: 1 Zen Room in the nature:  1 Kin Bed + patio
description:
House in the middle of Natural Parc del MontgrÃ­, les Illes Medes i el Baix Ter (Pals). Surrounded by nature, apple trees and agriculture land. Near many beautiful beaches (5/10 minutes by car). We have 2 houses, "the house" with rooms, gym and ping pong and the "social house" with a common space, kitchen, living room and piano. All rooms have private entrance and private bathroom (outside the room) with shower. Many spaces to be at your own (10.000 square meters) including a beautiful rooftop.

The space
Eco House, zen design. Ideal for people that love yoga, sports, arts, nature and calm. No parties, no noise. Classical and global musicians welcome.
The area is full of nice villages around and with many activities like yoga, mountain-bike, road-bike, windsurf, surf, horse riding, beautiful natural spaces, beaches, mountains, restaurants and so on.

neighborhood_overview: You will be in the middle of the agriculture land and apple trees. This is a unique space if you love nature. host_about:
Economist, MBA in business by ESADE and further studies in WHARTON,IMD and INSEAD, executive career in a global company, now acting as business advisor.
Love traveling, arts, focusing on music, I play clarinet in a trio and do sports like biking, mountain biking, swiming in open waters and golf.

name: Bedroom "Volta" with swimming-pool
description:
Double bed room in a house shared with other guests.
In a privileged place, with swimming pool, next to an ancient church. 5 minutes from BesalÃº medieval village and 35 minutes from the beach.
The room door is old and does not lock from the inside or outside.
The decor is simple and very very rustic in this room, do not expect to find a hotel. We thought that the best setting that could be found is the one proposed in the 18th century for this house.

The space
Take a swim in the pool, contemplating the Romanesque church of the XII century, in the same garden. Spectacular views of the snowy Pyrenees in winter.

Let your senses feel nature, peace, tranquility,...

It is located in a small village, Dosquers. Well located, half an hour from the beaches of the Costa Brava, 5 minutes from the beautiful medieval village.

Huge house of traditional Catalan construction, built between the XV and XVIII centuries. It has a small

host_about:
I am a civil engineer, father of a two years old boy. I work from home with my computer, doing bank assessment in future house prices. I love sport, I am a "retired" olympian rower. In my free time I try to do all what I can so that my guests have a good experience in that place I love so much: Dosquers. 
I live at the end of the garden, in a little house. Duc, a friendly Golden retriever, also shares my private space.

description:
Come to our entirely-restored Modernista home in the Centre of Sant Feliu de Guixols, We offer you a single room with a window to the stairwell. The house is conveniently located in a pedestrian area, very close to the local market, and at 180 metres from the beach.

The room measures 6 m2.

name: Double room with desk 5 minutes away from beach
description:
By staying in here, you will be located slightly away from the city center which will allow easier parking. But close enough at a walking distance (5-10 minutes) from the beach. We have a balcony where you will enjoy having your breakfast. The room is private being the bathroom shared with another Airbnb room. You make use of the common areas of the apartment. Costa Brava at an affordable price!

The space
Private room with closet and foldable desk and bed. The bathroom is shared with another room for tourists. Kitchen use is possible, please ask for the conditions.

Guest access
Balcony, Bathroom, Kitchen, Living Room (more info in private)

Very close, you will find all kinds of shops and restaurants where you can enjoy the best fish and fresh seafood from the Bay of Roses. Only 150 meters away is the sandy beach with one of the most crystalline waters of the coast of Girona and the promenade with wonderful views of the Bay of Roses. Ideal to enjoy with your family or your friends of the many possibilities offered by the Costa Brava.

The space
Las habitaciones de Casa Coco son un oasis de tranquilidad. La decoraciÃ³n bohemia y exÃ³tica crea un ambiente perfecto para relajar. Con la terraza o el balcÃ³n, la cama cÃ³moda y wifi gratuito disfrutaras de tus vacaciones.

name: Homestay by the SeaâSant Feliu de Guixols
description:
Please read carefully. Shared accommodation: Ideal for Live-Work or vacationers! Relax and "inhabit your dreams" in this airy, comfortable 3-bedroom, 2-bath apartment with large plant-filled year-round terrace overlooking the Mediterranean for stunning unobstructed views, one block from the sea. Use of beautifully private community pool. Close to best beaches and towns on the Costa Brava.
> Free on-street parking. Also a private garage if needed.
> Good wifi throughout.
>Everything provided!

The space
Due to Catalunya regulations, this property cannot be booked via Airbnb for less than 31 days. Contact me for more information. I have listed a 45-day maximum but this also can be flexible.

This home-share listing is for one of two well-appointed double bedrooms that are available in their own guest wing with a full bath, toiletries provided. Enjoy your visit solo/sola or, as a couple, in one room. OPTION: Rent both roomsâ¦ ideal for
neighborhood_overview:
Easy access to the Camino Ronda at the base of our street. Sant Feliu de Guixols, a beautiful 15-minute walk (.5mi/.8km), is a vibrant historic town with pedestrian streets and a huge variety of cafes, restaurants, stores and markets of all kinds, including a local daily market and large Sunday open-air market with vendors selling all manner of goods in addition to fruits and vegetables. Explore the history and sailboat-filled harbor, visit the monastery dating to the 10th century and home to the Carmen Thyssen art museum, and take advantage of both cultural events and a wide range of aquatic activities â sailing, paddle boarding, kayaking, scuba diving, plus rock climbing and, of course, hiking and cycling.

Platje Sant Pol (Sâagaro), also a short walk, is a popular large golden sand beach with restaurants and cafes and chiringuitas (beach bars) along the sea front.

Cyclists can explore 70 circular cycling routes that begin and end in Sant Feliu de Guixols: Gui
host_about:
Both an AIrbnb host and traveler for many years (and other travel/service organizations as well), I am a writer, business, coach, workshop facilitator and former digital nomad.  I try to tread softly in recognition of our fragile humanity. 
An American expat since 2011, having lived in Mexico, Cuba, France, Italy and now Spain, I finally feel at home on the beautiful Costa Brava and look forward to hosting each special guest and making your experience one of fabulous memories.

I appreciate  quality, beauty, great design, kindness, accountability, decency, durability, optimism, good stories, sunshine, ease and flow, Serendipity. 

My interests are ecclectic - architecture, philosophy, relationships, history, mythology, photography, sculpture, walking, bicycling, being on and near bodies of water, purposeful travel, cultivating friendships. 

Random somethings that somehow got into this description:
Love Actually, Casablanca, Isabel Allende, Sam Keen, Red Violin, Mindwalk, Remember Them, C. S. Lewis, Einstein, Folk music, Classical, Living Fully Alive, Travel Articles, Tao Te Ching, Jazz Standards, Byron Katie, Guitar and Cello, Mists of Avalon, Latin jazz and salsa.

name: Casa MolÃ­ Roquer, 2 double rooms by the pool
description:
Two double family rooms that are part of the Casa Rural MolÃ­ Roquer in RabÃ³s, in the Albera natural park, 15 km from the Costa Brava.

Adjacent rooms separated by a wall, spacious and bright with double beds, wardrobe, fan and bathroom with bathtub. also includes a kitchenette with single induction hob, mini-fridge, TV, toaster and microwave.

Outdoor patio with table for al fresco meals and sun loungers in front of the pool with magnificent view of the hills.

The space
Casa Rural MolÃ­ Roquer is a secluded, old Catalan farmhouse located in the heart of the Albera Park and the Catalan countryside with 6 hectares of garden and crossed by the Reguereda river.

These two double rooms have a comfortable double bed, a fan, wardrobe and share a private bathroom with a bathtub. One of the rooms also has a mini-fridge, kettle, and flat-screen TV. Guests can also use a single an induction hob stove to prepare some food, located in the interio
host_about:
Hola from the wild!

We are Fernando and Lorenzo, living in our farm and loving our animals in this incredible paradise called Lâ Albera National Park between the Pyrenees and the astonishing Costa Brava beaches.

Located in a a protected Natural Area , our farm is detached old mill originally dated 1766. We rent different units, the old Mill itself, the old Barn and the Garden rooms . 

All the guests share the pool, the stables and the river house and have access to the entire property of 6 hectares. We and our animals (horses, donkeys, geese, hens, roasters , horses, cat and small dogs) canât wait to have you here to share the beauty of the Catalan Pyrenees.

name: Antigua rectorÃ­a con vistas y piscina habitacion 1
description:
This villa is a unique and charming old rectory located in L'Alt EmpordÃ . It has a garden with wonderful views of the Pyrenees. There is a barbecue area, pergola, swimming pool, and some garden furniture. Inside you can enjoy its spectacular dining room, two lounges, a projection room where you can enjoy movies, upstairs terrace with amazing views, and cozy equipped kitchen. This room, which is for rent with one more room, has a beautiful view on the village church, and a bathroom just near it.

The space
The house is charming, quiet and with an eclectic decor that includes mostly vintage French and Spanish pieces.

Guest access
There is plenty of parking space in the village, just steps from the house.

Other things to note
There is a friendly dog on the premises. She sleeps indoors.

Please note that often both rooms are rented and you will share the kitchen and pool with up to two more guests.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located on the border with the Garrotxa, in the Alt EmpordÃ . It is surrounded by beautiful forests and fields, where you can make all kinds of excursions. It is also close to the Mare de Deu del Mont, a sanctuary 30 minutes away by car, where you can see all the Alt EmpordÃ  up to the sea. LladÃ³, the nearby village has a great restaurant called Carles Antoner, and if you drive to BesalÃ¹ 15 mins you reach a wonderful village full of other dining options. The house is also only 15 mins drive from the AVE at Figueres Vilafant, so it is really easy to access. Figueres, very close by, as well as Banyoles, five minutes away, also have stores and restaurants as well as the world famous Dali museum. We are only 50 minutes from CadaquÃ©s if you fancy a day trip, and we are 20 minutes from wonderful beaches such as Sant Pere Pescador or L'Escala. There is plenty to see and do in the surrounding area.
host_about: French-American but I grew up in Catalunya. I love to meet new people!

name: Loqat at Mitjanas: B&B amidst evergreen forest
description:
Immerse yourself in nature and enjoy the sounds of forest. Stay in a centuries' old, rustic masia that breathes atmosphere and simplicity. Mitjanas hosts up to ten guests. Breakfast is included. Loqat is a double with en-suite bathroom in the main house.
Mitjanas offers many possibilities to get inspired by the green. Here, you are disconnected but at the same time close enough to venture out to old villages, cities, high mountains or the many coves and beaches of the nearby coast.

The space
Loqat is a double with en-suite bathroom, suitable for 1 or 2 people. The double bed measures 180 x 200 cm (in consultation it can be offered with twin beds of 90 x 200 cm). It doesn't have a kitchen facility. You have direct access to the split level library area and, via stairs, to the living where breakfast is served. Through there, the smaller terrace shaded by Alzina trees, with a table and hanging chair can be reached, as well as the main terrace with a large tab
host_about:
I am Caroline, running a small-scale B&B surrounded by the Garrotxa forest in Catalunya with my partner Tim. Between the two of us we have an international background in humanitarian aid and other social and environmental NGO work and the merchant navy. 
When we came across this special place we decided to take our lives into a more down-to-earth direction whilst at the same time sharing a peaceful place where you can retreat, be inspired by nature, dedicate yourself to hiking, meditation, yoga, qi gong or other practices. Together with our little daughter we now enjoy every day the atmosphere and sounds of the forest with all its green, its birds, flowers and wildlife.

name: Superior Room Mas Bosch

Enjoy the relaxed, discreet and intimate atmosphere in the middle of nature, in the heart of the EmpordÃ . name: Habitacion Doble Economica | Hotel Cluc
description:
The twelve rooms, all double and exterior, are spread over three unique floors, designed to create an intimate and cozy atmosphere. They have their own fully equipped bathroom, with hair dryer, heating and air conditioning with their own regulation. And a saying written on the walls that invites us to rest. You'll enjoy your time at this cheerful getaway.

The space
Located in the old quarter of the village, the building used to be called Can PallÃ­ and was refurbished in 2012 in line with its original architecture. Silent, well cared for and full of details, the Cluc is home to restored furniture, fabrics and textures, cement tile floors and emblematic communal areas.

Guest access
- Buffet
Start the day as you mean to go on with breakfast on our hotelâs small patio. We have national and international press for those wanting to know whatâs going on in the world.

- Wi-fi Service
All rooms have free, individual internet con
neighborhood_overview:
Begur was formerly a fishing village, a meeting point for coral workers, fishermen, returning emigrants from the Americas and cork workers. Its cobbled streets, the colonial houses of the locals who had returned from the Americas, the 16th Century defence towers and the Medieval Castle are icons of the village.

The local cuisine reflects its privileged location. You can find fresh local fish and seafood, seasonal and organic fruit and vegetables, top quality meatâ¦ Very different Mediterranean, modern, traditional and market cuisine styles. Festivities, fairs and traditions. Visits of cultural interest to sites, architectural remains and sea and mountain sporting activities, such as yachting, paddle boarding, snorkelling, kayaking, horse riding, golf, tennis and much more!
host_about: The Cluc is a charming little hotel, an old Indian house from the 1800's. The building, located in the old town, used to be called Can PallÃ­ and was rehabilitated in 2012 respecting its original architecture. Quiet, careful and full of details, in the Cluc you will find restored furniture, fabrics and textures, hydraulic floors and emblematic common spaces. In the library we have books in all languages for lovers of reading, in the living room, a Chester with magazines and two armchairs to chat, and outside, two terraces to enjoy the tranquility outdoors. When the weather permits, we serve breakfast outside. Sausages, sweets, cheeses and other products are zero kilometer; The pastries, yogurts, juices, smoothies, quince, creams and jams are natural, made by us. We do our best to offer a personalized and relaxed treatment, without dyes or preservatives, where we all feel calm and comfortable.

It has a king size double bed (1.60m) and a sofa bed (1.35m). It has capacity for a maximum of 3 people.Furnished balcony, full bathroom with shower, hair dryer, flat screen satellite TV, air conditioning and heating, fridge, telephone, safe for rent, slippers, free kettle and free Wi-Fi.

Can Buch is an ECOHotel with a professional restaurant, in La Vall de LlÃ©mena.

We have a garden based on permaculture techniques, a 100% self-sufficient farmhouse with the energies of the place and many animals that help us to practice regenerative agriculture based on the rotation of pastures: lambs, chickens, chickens, quails, turtles, geese, fish and our friendly cats and dogs.

We really want to share our way of life with you.

The space
LâAlzina (Double Superior)

- Double -

This room is called âLâAlzinaâ (the holm oak) because on the north side there is a beautiful window overlooking our holm oak forest.

The holm oak is the most common tree in the Catalan woods and the most affected by the reproduction and distribution of the pine tree.

It is a tree of culture and territory, very related to our ancestors and heavily used for coal in the era of the industrial revolution.

name: Tamariu Twin Room close to beach with private pool
description:
Twin Double room in a detached villa with garden & private pool (available mid May until mid September) , fast WI-FI, on-road free parking. Located close to the picturesque beach of Tamariu, with its seafront promenade and restaurants, just a 700m stroll downhill. Easy access by car to many of the most picturesque Calas of the Costa Brava and quaint medieval towns. Enjoy the villa and relax on its private pool (8m x 4m), garden & terraces with sun lounges, BBQ facilities, al fresco dining.

The space
Twin double room with 2 single beds that can be put together or separated. The room has built-in wardrobes and a chest of drawers, and view of the courtyard and garden. (bed linen, towels and toiletries are provided).

Guest access
The garden and private pool are available to the guests and shared with up to a maximum of 6 other guests. There is also a terrace with 8 sun lounges and BBQ facilities with tables and chairs for al fresco dining.

description:

The villa is located close to the picturesque beach of Tamariu, with its seafront promenade and restaurants, just a 700m stroll down. Twin double room with 2 single beds that can be put together or separated. The room has built-in wardrobes and has a view of the garden and pool area. (bed linen, towels and toiletries are provided).

Guest access
